item.title: Phone-Based Program Boosts Weight Loss in Breast Cancer
item.description: A telephone-based weight loss program leads to meaningful 1-year weight loss in women with stage II/III breast cancer and obesity. Medscape Medical Ne...

item.title: New First-Line Option for Advanced Bladder Cancer
item.description: NICE has recommended enfortumab vedotin plus pembrolizumab as a new first-line treatment for advanced urothelial cancer. Medscape News UK

item.title: Which Antiplatelet Works Better in Impaired Renal Function?

item.title: Location, Location: Blood Pressure Method Shapes Reading
item.description: New standards are needed to harmonize differences between in- and out-of-office blood pressure measurements. Medscape Medical News
